sect2.title: Installation of Lynx
sect2.para: Install Lynx by running the following commands.

userinput.command: ./configure --prefix=/usr --libdir=/etc --with-ssl --with-zlib && make && make install && make DOCDIR=/usr/share/doc/lynx-2.8.4/lynx_doc \ HELPDIR=/usr/share/doc/lynx-2.8.4/lynx_help install-doc && make DOCDIR=/usr/share/doc/lynx-2.8.4/lynx_doc \ HELPDIR=/usr/share/doc/lynx-2.8.4/lynx_help install-help && sed s/"t\/etc"/"t\/usr\/share\/doc\/lynx\-2\.8\.4"/ \ /etc/lynx.cfg > /etc/lynx.bak && mv /etc/lynx.bak /etc/lynx.cfg
